SA11n1102:743: mandasvaraṃ yāvatā dhvaninā pratipādyasya pratītiḥ syāt,
SA11n1102:747: avakramakuṭilaṃ paramaprītirasabharāvanatena cakṣuṣā tṛṣita iva śītalajala paramāhlādakaraṃ saṃpivanniva sattvān vyavalokayan |
SA11n1102:750: kutaḥ ? yasmādetān sattvān samāsādya durlabhalābhaṃ buddhatvaṃ me bhaviṣyati utpatsyate |
SA11n1102:751: evaṃ ca viharan adyatve'pi sattvārthasamartho bhavatyeva | yaduktam-
SA11n1102:755: etadeva ca bodhisattvasya kṛtyaṃ yaduta sattvāvarjanaṃ nāma |
SA11n1102:757: tathā tathā bhagavan bodhisattvena pratipattavyaṃ yatsahadarśanena sattvāḥ prasīdeyuḥ |
SA11n1102:759: na bhagavan bodhisattvasyānyat karaṇīyamasti anyatra sattvāvarjanāt |
SA11n1102:762: anādeyaṃ tu taṃ lokaḥ paribhūya jināṅkuram |
SA11n1102:765: tasmāt sattvārādhanameva bodhisattvasya karma upakārikṣetramasādhāraṇaṃ puṇyaprasūtiheturiti ||
SA11n1102:794: bodhiattvānāṃ ya ācāraḥ śikṣāsaṃvaralakṣaṇaḥ sa eva kuśalajalarakṣaṇāya setubandho vihitaḥ,
SA11n1102:800: evamanuttaraṃ jñātvā sattvānāṃ hitasukhavidhānāya nityamārabdhavīryo bhavet |
SA11n1102:801: pratiṣiddhārthe pravṛttau kathaṃ na sāpattika iti cet, na |
SA11n1102:802: kvacinniṣiddhamapi sattvārthaviśeṣaṃ prajñācakṣuṣā paśyataḥ karaṇīyatayā anujñātaṃ bhagavatā |
SA11n1102:805: api tu kṛpāloḥ karuṇāprakarṣapravṛttitayā tatparatantrasya parārthaikarasasya svaprayojanavimukhasya |
SA11n1102:815: yathoktaṃ prākūtatra dvividhaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ satatabhaiṣajyaṃ glānapratyayabhaiṣajyaṃ ca |
SA11n1102:817: tadarthaṃ piṇḍāya gocare caratā grāmapraveśe yathoktaśikṣāyāṃ smṛtimādhāya caritavyam |
SA11n1102:818: tato labdhāt piṇḍapātāt caturthabhāgavibhaktāt vinipātagatānanāthavratasthān saṃvibhāginaḥ kuryāt |
SA11n1102:822: sa paribhuñjāno na raktaḥ paribhuṅkte asaktaḥ,
SA11n1102:827: tathā ca paribhuṅkte yathā nātisaṃlikhito bhavati,
SA11n1102:832: tena taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya kuśalapakṣābhimukhena bhavitavyam |
SA11n1102:835: paribhuñjatā ca evaṃ manasikāra utpādayitavyaḥ-santi asmin kāye aśītikṛmikulasahasrāṇi,
SA11n1102:854: glānabhaiṣajyaṃ tu yāmikaṃ sāptāhikaṃ yāvajjīvikamiti trividham |
SA11n1102:863: uktaṃ ca bodhisattvapratimokṣe-sacetpunaḥ kaścidāgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā yāceta,
SA11n1102:866: sacetpunastasya ūnaṃ tricīvaraṃ bhavet yanniśritya brahmacaryāvāsaḥ,
SA11n1102:871: na tena alpecchatā āsevitā bhavet | iti ||
SA11n1102:881: yasmādanenaiva sukumāropakrameṇa saṃvardhamānaḥ śīghrameva sattvānāṃ hitasukhasaṃpādanasamartho bhavati ||
SA11n1102:887: atyārabdhena hi vīryeṇa svaparahitārthasya bādhā syāt |
SA11n1102:888: samapravṛtte punarāśaye svaparātmano'tirikte vā na niṣidhyate |
SA11n1102:890: adhikasattvārthaśaktestulyaśaktervā bodhisattvasya adhikatulyakuśalāntarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryāviti siddhaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1102:891: idameva ca saṃdhāya bodhisattvaprātimokṣe'bhihitam-yastu khalu punaḥ śāriputra abhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisattvo bodhyaṅgairabhiyuktaḥ,
SA11n1102:897: yaśca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnaparipūrṇāni tathāgatebhyo'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
SA11n1102:898: yaśca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisattvaḥ ekāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ prakāśayet,
SA11n1102:902: yasya punaḥ śāriputra pātrāgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaveddhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ,
SA11n1102:904: tatraivāha-yastu khalu punaḥ śāriputra anabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisattvaḥ,
SA11n1102:907: anyathā hi ekasattvārthasaṃgrahārthaṃ mahataḥ sattvarāśestasya ca sattvasya bodhisattvāśayaparikarmāntarāyānmahato'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syāditi ||
SA11n1102:918: dharmaṃ nirgaurave svasthe na śiroveṣṭite vadet |
SA11n1102:922: niṣiddhaṃ caitadbhagavatā iti tadājñātikrame sāpattiko bhavet |
SA11n1102:940: tādṛśaṃ ca dharmamalpeṣu asaṃskṛtabuddhiṣu hīnādhimuktiṣu vā na vadediti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ |
SA11n1102:941: na mātṛgrāmasya ekākī rahogato dharmaṃ vadet |
SA11n1102:945: śrāvakayānabhāṣiteṣu vā mahāyānabhāṣiteṣu vā dharmeṣu tulyaṃ cittaprasādādikaṃ kuryāt |
SA11n1102:949: gambhīrodāradharmabhājanaṃ ca sattvaṃ nimittajñairjñātvā na śrāvakayānādidharmeṣvavatārayet |
SA11n1102:950: na ca ācāraṃ śikṣāsaṃvarakaraṇīyatāṃ muktvā sūtrāntādipāṭhenaiva tava śuddhirbhaviṣyati iti dharmakāmaṃ prabhāvayet |
SA11n1102:951: āha cātra-punaraparo'nartho ratnakūṭe dṛṣṭaḥ-aparipāciteṣu sattveṣu viśvāso bodhisattvaskhalitam |
SA11n1102:954: āryasarvadharmavaipulyasaṃgrahe sūkṣmo'pyanartha uktaḥ-sūkṣmaṃ hi mañjuśrīḥ saddharmapratikṣepakarmāvaraṇam |
SA11n1102:955: yo hi kaścinmañjuśrīḥ tathāgatabhāṣite dharme kasmiṃścit śobhanasaṃjñāṃ karoti,
SA11n1102:962: āryākāśagarbhasūtre ca mūlāpattiprastāve coktam-punaraparamādikarmiko bodhisattvaḥ keṣāṃcidevaṃ vakṣyati-kiṃ bhoḥ prātimokṣavinayena ?
SA11n1102:963: śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayasva |
SA11n1102:965: yatte kiṃcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayādakuśalaṃ karma samudānītam,
SA11n1102:971: neṣṭaṃ jale sthale bhogye mūtrādeścāpi garhitam ||91 ||
SA11n1102:973: jale sthale bhogye upabhogye mūtrapurīṣāderapi kutsitam |
SA11n1102:981: dvāvapi bāhū samamekasmin kāle na mardayet |
SA11n1102:989: lokāprasādakaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca varjayet ||93 ||
SA11n1102:991: tat sarva dṛṣṭvā śāstre vyavahāre vā |
SA11n1102:994: anenaitaddarśitaṃ bhavati-dṛṣṭe'pi yadbādhākaramevaṃvidhaṃ tadvarjayet āpattirbhavatīti | yaduktam-
SA11n1102:1004: sa sarvasattvānurakṣayā ātmanaśca bodhisaṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ samyagīryāpatho bhavati,
SA11n1102:1005: mṛdubhāṇī mandabhāṇī asaṃsargabahulaḥ pravivekābhimukhaḥ suprasannamukhaḥ iti ||
SA11n1102:1040: na ca pārśvasukham anyatra yāvadevaiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai iti |
SA11n1102:1052: rātriṃdivaṃ ca triskandhaṃ triṣkālaṃ ca pravartayet |
SA11n1102:1059: athavā, saṃcitya kṛtā yāḥ pratikṛtāḥ tābhyo'nyāḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣeṇa asaṃprajānatā vā kṛtāḥ |
SA11n1102:1060: tāsāṃ praśamaḥ pratikaraṇaṃ tena triskandhaparivartanena bodhicittasya jinānāṃ ca bhagavatāṃ samāśrayaṇācca ||
SA11n1102:1063: caturbhirmaitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpamabhibhavati |
SA11n1102:1069: tatra vidūṣaṇāsamudācāraḥ akuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā vipratisārarūpātsavigarhaṇā pāpadeśanā,
SA11n1102:1078: ebhirmaitreya caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpamabhibhavatīti ||
SA11n1102:1079: viśeṣatastu bodhisattvāpattīnāṃ gurvīṇāṃ ladhvīnāṃ ca deśanā āryopāliparipṛcchāyāmuktāḥ |
SA11n1102:1081: sarvāpattayo bodhisattvena pañcatriṃśatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike rātriṃdivamekākinā deśayitavyāḥ |
SA11n1102:1082: tatreyaṃ deśanā- ahamevaṃnāmā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmītyārabhya yāvat saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi,
SA11n1102:1084: namo vajrapramardine ityārabhya yāvat upaimi sarvān śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ |
SA11n1102:1085: iti vistaramuktvāha-iti hi śāriputra bodhisattvena imān pañcatriṃśato buddhān pramukhān kṛtvā sarvatathāgatānugatairmanasikāraiḥ pāpaviśuddhiḥ kāryā |
SA11n1102:1086: tasyaivaṃ pāpaviśuddhasya ta eva buddhā bhagavanto mukhānyupadarśayanti |
SA11n1102:1088: na tat śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanikāyairāpattikaukṛtyasthānaṃ viśodhayituṃ yadbodhisattvasteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyadhāraṇaparikīrtanena rātriṃdivaṃ triskandhakadharmaparyāyapravartanena āpattikaukṛtyānniḥsarati,
SA11n1102:1096: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatim |
SA11n1102:1097: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃllabhanti te ||
SA11n1102:1101: yā avasthāḥ prapadyeta svayaṃ paravaśo'pi vā |
SA11n1102:1102: tāsvavasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ ||99 ||
SA11n1102:1105: na hi tadvidyate kiṃcidyanna śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ |
SA11n1102:1106: na tadasti na yatpuṇyamevaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ ||100 ||
SA11n1102:1107: yasmāt sarvākāraṃ sarvavastutattvamadhigamya sarveṣāṃ hitasukhavidhānārthamudyacchadbhirbuddhasutaiḥ na tadasti kiṃcit,
SA11n1102:1119: kiṃcit sattvānāmeva saṃsāraduḥkhapatitānāṃ tato niḥsaraṇāya sarvaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet ||
SA11n1102:1122: sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvitārthe'pi na tyajet |
SA11n1102:1127: caturdharmakasūtre'pyuktam- kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāvajjīvaṃ na tyaktavyamapi jīvitahetoriti |
SA11n1102:1134: yathoktamāryagaṇḍavyūhe āryaśrīsaṃbhavena-kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu |
SA11n1102:1148: ātmani ca te kulaputra āturasaṃjñotpādayitavyā kalyāṇamitreṣu ca vaidyasaṃjñā,
SA11n1102:1155: yaduktaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇāditi [śikṣā. sa. kā.-6],
SA11n1102:1169: āryākāśagarbhasūtre kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pañca mūlāpattayo nirdiṣṭāḥ |
SA11n1102:1171: tathā ādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya aṣṭau mūlāpattaya iti |
SA11n1102:1172: tathā ca tatroktam-pañca kulaputra kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya mūlāpattayaḥ yābhirmūlāpattibhiḥ kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhoṣayati |
SA11n1102:1175: yaḥ kulaputra kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ staupikaṃ vastu apaharati sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasaṃghe niryātitaṃ vā,
SA11n1102:1190: ādikarmikāṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca aṣṭau mūlāpattayaḥ,
SA11n1102:1191: yāmirmūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāropitānītyādi pūrvavat |
SA11n1102:1193: ye sattvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunā asmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke utpannāḥ,
SA11n1102:1195: yāvat, teṣāmidaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ yāvadvistareṇāgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti |
SA11n1102:1196: te hi akṛtaśramā bālapṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta utrasyanti,
SA11n1102:1201: tasmādbodhisattvena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāmāśayānuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāmanupūrveṇa dharmadeśanā kartavyeti |
SA11n1102:1202: sopāyāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervinivartya hīnayāne parasya cittamutpādayato dvitīyā |
SA11n1102:1203: prātimokṣaśikṣāsaṃvaraṃ vihāya mahāyāne cittotpādamātreṇa tatpaṭhanena cāsya śuddhiprakāśanāt tṛtīyā |
SA11n1102:1213: kṣatriyasya purohitāmātyacaṇḍālairye bhikṣavo daṇḍitā arthadaṇḍena sāṃghikaṃ staupikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā dravyamapahṛtya tebhya evopanāmayanti |
SA11n1102:1220: āsāṃ ca mūlāpattīnāṃ sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ śāstrakāropadarśitāḥ saṃgrahakārikā ucyante-
SA11n1102:1258: nānāsūtraikadeśānāṃ vā samuccayamebhireva kṛtaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa paśyet vyavalokayet granthato'rthato vā |
SA11n1102:1261: āryanāgārjunapādairnibaddhaṃ dvitīyaṃ śikṣāsamuccayaṃ sūtrasamuccayaṃ ca paśyet prayatnataḥ ādarataḥ |
SA11n1102:1265: yato nivāryate yatra yadeva ca niyujyate |
SA11n1102:1289: yatkāyāvasthāyāḥ cittāvasthāyāśca sarveryāpatheṣu pratyavekṣā nirūpaṇaṃ sarvavāraṃ yathā pratipāditaṃ prāk ||
SA11n1102:1290: sarvametaduktaśikṣākauśalaṃ karmaṇā niṣpādayitavyaṃ na vacanamātreṇeti niyamayitumāha-
SA11n1102:1291: kāyenaiva paṭhiṣyāmi vākpāṭhena tu kiṃ bhavet |
SA11n1102:1296: na tu śabdamātraghoṣaṇayā niṣphalatvāditi bodhisattvena yatitavyam |
SA11n1102:1297: kathamiva ? vaidyakaśāstrādhyayanamātreṇa tatkriyāmakurvato vyādhigrastasya kiṃ phalaṃ niṣpatsyate ?
